Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.26-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.26-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd is earlier than 1.6.26-8, affected by CVE-2024-24786
